inclusion.criterion: At least 725 MET-minutes/week on International Physical Activity Questionnaire Short Form
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Surgery occurring at least 7 days from date of randomization (to allow for collection of at least 7 days of preoperative accelerometer data)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to follow up at 3 months for in-office exam
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Enrollment in another research study of pelvic organ prolapse
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Planned further surgery in the next 3 months or anticipated treatment which would result in prolonged inactivity (such as a cancer diagnosis) 3 months postoperatively
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has cervical cancer and underwent tubal ligation. She smokes 30 packs/year and drinks alcohol frequently.
